forecaster.canada.forecaster module¶

Provides a Canada-specific implementation of Forecaster.

class forecaster.canada.forecaster.ForecasterCanada(settings=<class 'forecaster.canada.settings.SettingsCanada'>, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.forecaster.Forecaster

Tests Forecaster (Canada).

__init__(settings=<class 'forecaster.canada.settings.SettingsCanada'>, **kwargs)[source]¶

Inits Forecaster with Canada-specific settings.

In addition to using a Canada-specific Settings object by default, this class also provides Canada-specific defaults and init logic for RRSPs, TFSAs, TaxableAccounts, and Tax objects.

add_rrsp(inflation_adjust=None, cls=<class 'forecaster.canada.accounts.RRSP'>, **kwargs)[source]¶

Adds an RRSP to the forecast.

add_taxable_account(acb=None, cls=<class 'forecaster.canada.accounts.TaxableAccount'>, **kwargs)[source]¶

Adds a TaxableAccount to the forecast.

add_tfsa(inflation_adjust=None, cls=<class 'forecaster.canada.accounts.TFSA'>, **kwargs)[source]¶

Adds a TFSA to the forecast.

set_tax_treatment(inflation_adjust=None, province=None, cls=<class 'forecaster.canada.tax.TaxCanada'>, **kwargs)[source]¶

Sets tax treatment for the forecast.

Overrides set_tax_treatment to deal with different parameter list for canada.tax objects.
